document.full_text: the state's campaign finance watchdog recommended the largest fine in the agency's history against mayor antonio r. villaraigosa, saying he failed to report free tickets to dozens of events.
document.title: west: california: mayor may be fined over free tickets
lines_and_colors: the state's campaign finance watchdog recommended the largest fine in the agency's history against mayor antonio r. villaraigosa, saying he failed to report free tickets to dozens of events.
